title: Automobile Tire Pneumatic Casings, Shipments for United States
notes:
Shipments Include Only Tires Forwarded To Purchasers. Those Forwarded To Warehouses, Branches, Or On A Consignment Basis Are Included In Stocks Figures. Data Reported To The Rubber Manufacturers' Association (Rma) Were Raised To Industry Totals By Them. NBER Compared Published Data Directly With Rma Files. A Large Volume Of Shipments Undoubtedly Were Caused By A U.S. Excise Tax On Manufacturers' Sales, Which Went Into Effect On June 30, 1932. Source: Survey Of Current Business, May 1939, P.16 And Following Issues.

This NBER data series m01240 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01240
